feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Removing smithy package by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15551

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.8...3.4.9

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Convert client builder store by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15543
  • ensure app ownership middleware by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15556

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.9...3.4.10

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix error message and extract tenantId from appId by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15561

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.10...3.4.11

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Table settings updates by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15527
  • Validate handlebars by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15552
  • Relationship field - make sure selected value correctly displays by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15553
  • Add tests for cron stopping. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15566
  • Test cron removal. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15569

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.11...3.4.12

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Convert builder components helpers to ts by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15564
  • store koa sessions in redis instead of cookies by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15575

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.12...3.4.13
